solution_line_template: From selling her tomatoes, she can make {num_tomatoes} * ${price_per_tomato} = $<<{num_tomatoes}*{price_per_tomato}={tomato_revenue}>>{tomato_revenue}.
From selling her carrots, she can make {num_carrots} * ${price_per_carrot} = $<<{num_carrots}*{price_per_carrot}={carrot_revenue}>>{carrot_revenue}.
The total amount of money she can make is ${tomato_revenue} + ${carrot_revenue} = $<<{tomato_revenue}+{carrot_revenue}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue}.
